author: Laura Fletcher
title: 85 refugee healthcare workers seek new accommodation
description: The Irish Refugee Council (IRC) has been contacted by 85 healthcare workers living in Direct Provision who are looking to move out.
content:
The Irish Refugee Council (IRC) has been contacted by 85 healthcare workers living in Direct Provision who are looking to move out.
The Health Service Executive (HSE) has confirmed that these asylum seekers can now apply for temporary accommodation under a s… [+8949 chars]
